title: Lower Rewards Than Stated On Website
body:
I was just checking the party rewards and found a premade 5 would earn 300% extra IP instead of 400%.

Website: http://imgur.com/JwqN7sf
In-Game: http://imgur.com/nmp4mhV

replies.body:
Ty for report we are on it! 

http://i.imgur.com/zuaccye.png

Will OCE get this deal again when normal queue champ select comes out? 

a number of us aren't so keen to jump headfirst into ranked (especially not week 1 of the season when its all going crazy), but unlike the rest of the world we miss out on getting IP boosts in normals. (just like we miss out on 3v3 ranked icons)
No promises, but let me raise this with the team and see what we can do. Will update this comment as soon as I can.
